scripts.server:build:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun build server/src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile server/dist/server
scripts.server:build:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun build server/src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile server/dist/server
scripts.server:build:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production bun build server/src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile server/dist/server.exe
scripts.postinstall: bunx prisma generate --schema server/prisma/schema.mysql.prisma && bunx prisma generate --schema server/prisma/schema.postgres.prisma && bunx prisma generate --schema server/prisma/schema.mssql.prisma
